message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset that I believe would be highly beneficial to your business. I'm confident it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000, which represents a significant saving compared to its true value. This offer is exclusive to you, and I won't be able to provide this same opportunity to anyone else. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
